Attacks.Name: Flame Burst
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Fire Spin
Attacks.Effect: This attack affects all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character. Characters hit by this attack gain the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Heat Wave
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Incinerate special condition, reducing their defense by 1 until the end of their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Flash Fire
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is targeted by a energy-type attack, it takes no damage and instead gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Fiery Teleport
Superpowers.Effect: Place this character within range 3 of its current position.

Attacks.Name: Inferno
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, if a wild is rolled, the target character and all characters within range 2 of the target gain the Burn special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Will-O-Wisp
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range 3. That character gains the Burn special condition. This superpower can be used only once per turn.
